name: Gargo
message: Wow!! This is amazing. I have enjoyed seeing you grow up, which was too fast. Thank you for naming me. At first hearing the name, I wasn't sure but I love it now. It is great seeing you grow into a young man who knows what you want to do. I have enjoyed playing games and hand, foot and elbow with you. I think I won once!! Looking forward to what the Lord has for you!!

name: Aunt Karen
message: Congratulations Silas! So proud of your accomplishments!

name: System
message: This section showcases messages sent to the graduate, offering words of encouragement, congratulations, or memories. Messages will appear here after processing, so please allow some time for them to be uploaded.
Want to send a message? Click here to submit one!
